nightmareMode.title: Nightmare Mode
nightmareMode.description: Enter the darkest and most thrilling mode in Sprunki history. Face your fears in this intense gaming experience!

soundscape.title: Unique Soundscape
soundscape.description: Immerse yourself in innovative musical compositions created through character interactions and transformations.

transformation.title: Extreme Transformations
transformation.description: Witness characters evolve into their most terrifying forms. Each transformation brings new abilities and challenges!

immersive.title: Dynamic Environment
immersive.description: Experience a constantly changing world that responds to your actions. Every playthrough brings new surprises!

community.title: Join the Nightmare
community.description: Connect with other Sprunki Phase 3 players worldwide. Share your experiences and discover new strategies together!

mainImage.alt: Sprunki Phase 3 Gameplay Screenshot - Experience the Nightmare

howItWorks.title: Enter the Nightmare of Sprunki Phase 3
howItWorks.description: Ready to face your fears? Follow these steps to begin your terrifying journey into Sprunki Phase 3. Each step brings you closer to the ultimate nightmare experience!

step1.title: Begin the Nightmare
step1.description: Drag the creepy eyeball icon to trigger Phase 3 and enter the nightmare mode. Watch as your world transforms into darkness!

step2.title: Transform Characters
step2.description: Experience the horrifying transformation of characters into their most extreme forms. Each character brings unique abilities and terrors!

step3.title: Master the Soundscape
step3.description: Navigate through intense sound effects and eerie music. Let the haunting melodies guide you through the nightmare!

step4.title: Survive the Horror
step4.description: Face increasingly challenging scenarios in nightmare mode. Unlock new terrors and discover the darkest secrets of Sprunki Phase 3!

gameTips.title: Master Sprunki Phase 3 Nightmare Mode
gameTips.description: Unlock the darkest secrets of Sprunki Phase 3 with these essential survival tips. Are you ready to face your fears and conquer the nightmare?

survival.title: Stay Alive
survival.description: Keep your wits about you in Sprunki Phase 3. Watch your surroundings carefully and never let your guard down in nightmare mode!

transformation.title: Embrace Change
transformation.description: Character transformations are key in Sprunki Phase 3. Learn to master each terrifying form to unlock their unique abilities!

observation.title: Watch the Signs
observation.description: Pay attention to environmental cues and eerie sounds in Sprunki Phase 3. They might warn you of approaching horrors!

mastery.title: Face Your Fears
mastery.description: The more you face the nightmares in Sprunki Phase 3, the stronger you become. Each terror conquered makes you more powerful!

strategy.title: Plan Your Escape
strategy.description: Think ahead in Sprunki Phase 3's nightmare mode. Always have an escape route ready and know when to fight or flee!

faq.mainTitle: Sprunki Phase 3 FAQ - Unveiling the Nightmare
faq.description: Discover the dark secrets of Sprunki Phase 3. Find answers to your most haunting questions about the nightmare that awaits.

whatIs.question: What is Sprunki Phase 3?
whatIs.answer: Sprunki Phase 3 is the most intense and terrifying chapter in the Sprunki saga. It's a revolutionary horror experience where characters undergo extreme transformations, soundscapes shift with your actions, and every decision could be your last in nightmare mode!

howToPlay.question: How do I enter Sprunki Phase 3?
howToPlay.answer: To begin your descent into madness, drag the creepy eyeball icon to trigger Phase 3. Once activated, you'll experience character transformations, haunting soundscapes, and increasingly challenging scenarios in nightmare mode. Remember, survival depends on your ability to adapt to the horror!

gameModes.question: What makes nightmare mode special?
gameModes.answer: Nightmare mode in Sprunki Phase 3 is our most intense experience yet. Characters transform into their most terrifying forms, the environment responds to your actions, and the soundscape shifts to match the growing horror. Every playthrough brings new terrors and challenges!

characters.question: How do character transformations work?
characters.answer: In Sprunki Phase 3, characters undergo extreme transformations as you progress through nightmare mode. Each transformation unlocks new abilities and challenges, but beware - with greater power comes greater horror. Master each form to survive the nightmare!

soundtrack.question: Tell me about the soundscape
soundtrack.answer: The dynamic soundscape in Sprunki Phase 3 is a crucial part of the horror experience. Environmental sounds, character interactions, and haunting melodies combine to create an immersive atmosphere that responds to your actions and intensifies with each transformation!

difficulty.question: How challenging is Sprunki Phase 3?
difficulty.answer: Sprunki Phase 3 is designed to test your limits. The difficulty increases as you progress through nightmare mode, with each transformation and new scenario presenting greater challenges. But don't worry - the more you face your fears, the stronger you become!

community.question: Can I share my nightmare experience?
community.answer: Absolutely! Join our global community of Sprunki Phase 3 players to share your experiences, discover new strategies, and compare your most terrifying moments. Connect through our social channels and become part of the growing nightmare!

faq.needHelp: Still haunted by questions about Sprunki Phase 3?

testimonials.title: Survivor Stories from Sprunki Phase 3
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from those who dared to face the nightmare. These are the tales of those who experienced Sprunki Phase 3 and lived to tell about it.

player1.content: I've never experienced anything like Sprunki Phase 3. The character transformations are truly terrifying, and the soundscape... it still haunts my dreams. Absolutely brilliant!
player1.name: Alex R.

player2.content: The nightmare mode in Sprunki Phase 3 is a masterpiece of horror. Every session brings new terrors, and the dynamic environment keeps you on edge. I can't stop coming back for more!
player2.name: Sarah M.

player3.content: As a horror game veteran, I thought I'd seen it all. Then Sprunki Phase 3 came along. The way characters transform and the atmospheric sound design create an unforgettable nightmare experience.
player3.name: Marcus D.

player4.content: The community aspect of Sprunki Phase 3 adds another layer of terror. Sharing experiences with other players and discovering new horrors together makes the nightmare even more immersive.
player4.name: Luna K.

player5.content: I love how each playthrough of Sprunki Phase 3 feels unique. The transformations are unpredictable, and the soundscape adapts to your actions. It's a living nightmare that keeps evolving!
player5.name: Viktor N.

player6.content: The attention to detail in Sprunki Phase 3 is incredible. From the subtle environmental changes to the bone-chilling sound effects, every element works together to create pure horror perfection.
player6.name: Yuki T.

gameGuide.title: Sprunki Phase 3 Survival Guide
gameGuide.description: Master the art of survival in Sprunki Phase 3. From basic survival techniques to advanced nightmare manipulation, this guide will help you face your darkest fears.

tips: Always keep an eye on your surroundings - danger lurks everywhere
Learn to recognize warning signs in the environment
Maintain awareness of your escape routes
Conserve your energy for critical moments

When there's no space left for new blocks

tips: Try to fill complete rows or columns to clear them

blockBlastSolver.title: sprunki phase 3 Solver Instructions
blockBlastSolver.description: This is a tool to help you find the optimal solution in sprunki phase 3 game. Follow these steps:

steps.step1: Click or drag mouse to set initial blocks on the main board (shown in green)
steps.step2: Design your Figure shapes in the three small grids below (distinguished by red, yellow, and blue)
steps.step3: Click "Calculate Optimal Solution" to see placement suggestions

gameRules.title: Game Rules Tips:
rules: When 8 cells in the same row or column are filled, they will be automatically cleared
After clearing, other blocks remain in place (no gravity effect)
Three Figures can be placed in any order

interactions.clickOrDrag: Click or drag to set initial blocks
interactions.noValidPlacement: Current layout cannot place any Figure, please try another layout
interactions.continueDesigning: You can continue designing new Figures for the next round

introduction.title: Welcome to Sprunki Phase 3: The Ultimate Nightmare Experience
introduction.description: Step into the darkest chapter of the Sprunki saga with Sprunki Phase 3. Experience the most intense transformations, haunting soundscapes, and spine-chilling gameplay that will push your limits. Are you brave enough to face the nightmare that awaits?
